extendedInfo.description: Paper Cars is out of beta now as Cars & Guns 3D!Thanks all for your support!--------------------------Unique racing experience in the word of paper cars! 3D graphics and car design based on real models!In current beta version you have: 14 cars (4 new), 11 misions, parts nad weapons, car updates, online leaderboard, saving game progress,control methods setup (go to Options / Controls).Much more things will come in updates! The game is under development but you can testsome features and if you like support the projectin the android market (by giving us 5 stars;) )

reviews.title: amazing ,fun game,i love it,more action
reviews.comment: wow! amazing but plz plz plz update more cars  ;)
reviews.author: Carmelita Ricafort

reviews.title: Fricken amazing
reviews.comment: I love this game, it is so much fun. It is also an amazing way to kill some time... finish the full version, and add more cars and tracks.
reviews.author: Scott Teves

reviews.title: Strange yet fun!..?
reviews.comment: I too went to a strange land. Tim Byrton film I think... I think I was driving a signing avocado, or mango..? Cool!
reviews.author: M. G.H.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t run
reviews.comment: This game doesn\'t even pass the sponsor advert at the start of the app. I\'m using a Samsung Galaxy S3. I understand this game is in beta so I\'m looking forward to playing it when I can.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: A nice game for you guyz by which you can enjoy it anything with steering wheel,arrows,sensation etc              This is best for your android tabs/mob.  Developer should add more levels for racing as racing is so popular
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Laggy, to many adds and when the adds reset and lags me out and i lose thx u jews

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Desires more popularity easy and after you get the hang of it it\'s really fun. Love the gun feature just love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Loving this game works well on low end phone keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t even open for my phone.
reviews.comment: It opens into a weird pixelated box that says something with an arrow and then it exits out. Your cars and guns app works but this doesn\'t.
reviews.author: Steven P

reviews.title: Hurry up
reviews.comment: THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER please hurry to make the new and full one with more car selections nd like a story mode where u can tune ur car, to hook up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: best
reviews.comment: addicting.almost have all cars.just wish there were mirrors so you can see behind you
reviews.author: Lee Neilson

reviews.title: COOL
reviews.comment: Buy 1957 in the start and you will then have a chance to come first in the 3 cars race.then buy snake, then FEZO and then McLarry.if you follow these instructions then an easier game will be hard to find.
reviews.author: Jatin Krish Vig

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Maybe add some stunts track or more racer track. Fun game nice concept. When you jump of the ramp the car slows down maybe make the speed be constant after the jump( just my opinion). Overall a great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LACKING GAME!!!!
reviews.comment: This game is quite good, the graphics are good too, but the only point I hate is the game LACKS!! That is the freaking reqson why you guys have got only two pathetic stqrs! Please fix this problem and you guys will get 5 stars/ 4stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cardboard Gold!
reviews.comment: Wow. I love this game! Remarkable graphic style- perfectly designed cardboard replicas of actual cars, cruising around in a little shoebox panorama. Love the city track in the minigame. For beta, runs pretty clean. Jeepy seems to have issues with jumping straight, but the Polon did fine. Can\'t wait to see some new tracks, maybe some visual customizations for cars- paint, bodykits, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Epic and fun
reviews.comment: Awesome game. I don\'t care of silly unhelpful commets that arent going to help. My idea is to have free mode which you can run around and crash into things.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just like in iOS
reviews.comment: Cars & Guns 3D on iOS, but on Android with a outdated version. Prefer iOS version better :P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I want this game to be 5 star so bad. The controls get frustrating and kill it. Bit otherwise loads of fun. Make the garbage and girls easier to see would be nice. Totally recommend this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I got the puppywagon and I sold it :D
reviews.comment: Really fun The concept is cool and the controls unlike many games are great! If you don\'t like the controls you can edit them in the options great gam
reviews.author: A Google User
